text: "Manhattan Project" is a 1985 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush. It appeared on their 11th studio album Power Windows and was not released as a single but made number 10 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. It is named after the World War II project that created an atomic bomb. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Progressive pop songs Category:Art pop songs
title: Manhattan Project (song)
